content: we have users that are not able to narrow to some streams. In the console they are getting an error that says "Unknown email in presence data: <username>" for a user that has not been an employee
and the username does not appear in our database in the zerver_userprofiletable
@Tim April that is very strange. How did you investigate whether the user is a real Zulip user account?
Does the error happen every time they try to narrow to the target stream, or is something else happening?

I have no record of that username in the database, at least the places I checked. They have also not been a user in the past (of zulip or our company). For zulip i checked for the email in the zerver_userprofile table

We have had a number of users hit this issue. The symptoms appear to be if the user had unread messages before the 1.9.4 to 2.0.6 upgrade and they logged in to the upgraded instance and narrowed to a handful (or nearly all streams) they would have a blank center part of the screen (where the messages would go) and then an error in the console
